content.help:
You can login via device login or by using client credentials

To use device login, simply run the command like so:
    $ gwa login

To use your credentials you must supply both a client-id and client-secret:
    $ gwa login --client-id <YOUR_CLIENT_ID> --client-secret <YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET>

Usage:
  gwa login [flags]

Flags:
      --client-id string       Your gateway's client ID
      --client-secret string   Your gateway's client secret
  -h, --help                   help for login

Global Flags:
      --host string        Set the default host to use for the API
      --namespace string   Assign the namespace you would like to use
      --scheme string      Use to override default https
content.login_help:
Log in to your IDIR account

Usage:
  gwa login [flags]

Flags:
      --client-id string       Your gateway's client ID
      --client-secret string   Your gateway's client secret
  -h, --help                   help for login

Global Flags:
      --host string     Set the default host to use for the API
      --scheme string   Use to override default https
content.namespace_help:
Longer explanation to come...

Usage:
  gwa namespace [command]

Available Commands:
  create      Create a new namespace
  list        List all your managed namespaces

Flags:
  -h, --help   help for namespace

Global Flags:
      --host string        Set the default host to use for the API
      --namespace string   Assign the namespace you would like to use
      --scheme string      Use to override default https

Use "gwa namespace [command] --help" for more information about a command.
content.config_help:
Configuration commands

Usage:
  gwa config [command]

Available Commands:
  set         Write a specific global setting

Flags:
  -h, --help   help for config

Global Flags:
      --host string        Set the default host to use for the API
      --namespace string   Assign the namespace you would like to use
      --scheme string      Use to override default https

Use "gwa config [command] --help" for more information about a command.
